Hamilton Superintendent Dave Tebo is promoting a simple idea to encourage our community! 1) Make a heart on a piece of paper. 2. Write the words "We Can Do This!" on your heart. You can color it or make it as creative as you would like. 3. Tape it to your window or front door so people can see it as they drive or walk by. 4) Take a photo of it with your family and upload it to social media with the #WeCanDoThis and tag us at @hamiltonschoolsmi. We'll repost our favorites!

"Just this simple encouragement can make someone feel good today," Tebo said. "Hopefully it will for you, your families, and the people that see it."
